Authentication Client

sssd-pam-ldap dev VM (10.70.3.117)

sssd cache user group, so when use change group in ldap, you don't have the change in your vm right away.

Admin user needs to refresh sssd cache, if end user wants to see immediately the change.

sudo sss_cache -E

To have to change right away, you need to clear sssd cache, and user need to log out and re-login to see the difference.

Mid term Objectives

  1. Be able to replace Pierre and Audrey when they are off duty.
  2. Continue passport project.
  3. Migration from freeBSD to centos7 (More details in redmine : https://devtools.bioaster.org/redmine/projects/migration-of-vm-from-free-bsd-to-centos-7)

Short term Objectives

For pierre replacement

  1. Get account for connecting and managing cloud (openstack and vmware)
  2. Be able to creat VM by following the SOP and good pratice of UTEC 6.
  3. Be able to manage and maintain VM in cloud(e.g. resize, run playbook, etc.)
  4. With green light of Guillaume, develop a web interface for managing vm and playbook.

The idea came from Pierre, use ansible dynamic inventory to get all vm info, send them to foreman to make the web interface. Use the foreman ansible plugin to run playbook on all vms.

For Audrey replacement

  1. Get account for connectin owncloud, (Owncloud management guide https://wiki.bioaster.org/employes/pengfei.liu_bioaster.org/owncloud)
  2. Learn the basic of bio-data management (e.g. SOP, good practice).
  3. Be able to creat dir-tree for projects and utecs for data storage
  4. Find a solution for large file upload within owncloud, if impossible, search better file managing solutions (Possible candiate: seafile, pydio)

Long term Objectives

To be determined with Guillaume!!!

  • Big data infra for bio data analysis (machine learning, etc.)
